doc:
Laura Hope Crews https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Laura_Hope_Crews 0 Laura Hope Crews (December 12, 1879 – November 12, 1942) was a leading actress of the American stage in the first decades of the 20th century who is best remembered today for her later work as a character actress in motion pictures of the 1930s. Her best-known film role was Aunt Pittypat in Gone with the Wind. Laura_Hope_Crews ( December_12 , 1879 – November_12_,_1942 ) was a_leading_actress of the_American_stage in the_first_decades of the_20th_century who is_best_remembered today for her_later_work as a_character_actress in motion_pictures of the_1930s . Her_best-known_film_role was Aunt_Pittypat in Gone with the_Wind .
